title: Verordnung des WBF vom 7. Juni 2010 Ã¼ber die Deklaration von Holz und Holzprodukten
title_en: FDEA Ordinance of 7 June 2010 on the Declaration for Timber and Timber Products

provisions.title: Timber and timber products subject to declaration
provisions.content: The duty to declare applies to timber and timber products specified in the Annex.

provisions.title: Reference system for the declaration of timber species
provisions.content: The reference system for the declaration of the timber species comprises: a. the commercial timber list of the Swiss Timber Trade Centre; and b. Standard SN EN 13556:2003. The list may be inspected under: www.konsum.admin.ch The standards may be inspected free of charge and obtained for a fee from the Swiss Association for Standardization (SNV), Sulzerallee 70, 8404 Winterthur; www.snv.ch

provisions.title: Commencement
provisions.content: This Ordinance comes into force on 1 October 2010.
